subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: From Lou Piniella in 1995 to Jim Leyland in 2011, they know not to chortle or talk trash before embarking on a postseason series at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: From Lou Piniella in 1995 to Jim Leyland in 2011, they know not to chortle or talk trash before embarking on a postseason series at Yankee Stadium.
